channel.title: Where to add vocals?
channel.description: I made the instrumental I have a recording app where do those meet? I tried doing my recordings as samples but samples can only be 10 seconds long. Help.

item.title: Where to add vocals?
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
Don’t try to mix your vocals within Auxy.

You can use GarageBand, or a mobile DAW that I like to use for mixing and combining tracks called MultiTrack.

Just obtain the audio track on your phone and open it in MultiTrack and you’re all set.

Read full topic

item.title: Where to add vocals?
item.dc:creator: Ninjendo
item.description:
Hi. and if you export your file as an audio, you can save it in the files directory on your iOS device running iOS 11. Otherwise you can just copy and paste the audio

Read full topic
